author: mmao
msg: * Using NSManager to resolve the prefix instead of hard code strings

author: mmao
msg: Address in an EPR cannot be null, when serviceName or portName is null

author: jleroux
msg: A patch from Amit Shinde "Discussion about the interaction between order total promotions and sales taxes" (https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-225) - OFBIZ-225
It's now possible to include promotions in sales tax calculations. In order for that to happen, make sure to set the 'taxPromotions' flag in the TaxAuthorityRateProduct table to 'Y'.

author: rpluem
msg: * Revert to old behaviour: Even if we detect a bad character: Formally decode
string correctly and do not mess up the string. Let the caller decide what
it wants to do with the result according to our return code.
